### Reflexology benefits
Suitable for all ages **Reflexology** brings relief from a wide range of acute & chronic conditions.

<figure class=tc>

### Professional experience

**Katy Phillips** is a professional reflexology practitioner who applies pressure to the feet & hands to encourage the body to heal naturally.

A full member of the **Association of Reflexologists**, Katy qualified in 2008 and has been practicing professionally across Cheshire for 9 years.
